About me


With ten years of knowledge and experience, I am a hairdresser who is dedicated to the craft with heart and soul. My vision is continuous development, so that I can always offer the best and see the happiness shine in the eyes of my clients.

I always strive to stay up-to-date with the latest color techniques and hair styles, so that I can surprise my clients with unique and modern looks. For me, hairdressing is not just a profession, it's an art that I practice with love and passion.

My goal is to accentuate your natural beauty and create a style that perfectly suits your personality and lifestyle. I take the time to listen to your desires, and together we work on a look that makes you feel confident and radiant.

With passion, dedication, and attention to detail, I want to ensure that you leave with a smile and feel proud of your new look. So, come by and let me bring your hair wishes to life, as we together unleash your personal style. I look forward to welcoming you to my salon and making you shine with a beautiful new hair creation.

Sergiu Siminel Hairdresser

Partners
